normalized: the only reason why azuma could have rushed to this place was because she had sensed something about cara's curious demeanour as well.

name: yamakawa
normalized: cara was here with me until just a few moments ago.

name: azuma
normalized: aah… so, it was about the strange feeling that i have been getting from miss queen lately, huh?

name: yamakawa
normalized: hold up.
let us go back to what you were saying just now.
you mentioned something about me being in the right place, didn't you?

name: azuma
normalized: ohoo!
i forgot to mention that.
that's right.
i was referring to the backyard!

name: yamakawa
normalized: the backyard!?
speaking of the backyard──

name: azuma
normalized: i happened to pass by that place quite recently when i sensed an unbelievably dangerous feeling from there!
like it was coming from the backyard, you know?
that's why i was so anxious.

name: yamakawa
normalized: no way…!?
i got a bad feeling about it and rushed off to that place, accompanied by azuma.
i came to the aforementioned place and started digging at the spot where she had been buried.
however…
i stopped my hands, after having dug deep enough.

name: azuma
normalized: t-this is…!?

name: yamakawa
normalized: … i see… so, that is how it is, huh?

name: azuma
normalized: it's just as i had felt.
so, this is what the queen's strange demeanour was all about, huh?

name: yamakawa
normalized: indeed, it was.
before we even knew about it, the moon had appeared in the sky.
i curled the edges of my lips, while looking down at the empty hole under the pale-blue light of the moon.
